expected_intermediate_agent_responses.author: marketing_idea_generator_agent
expected_intermediate_agent_responses.text:
Hello! I'm your AI Marketing Research & Strategy Assistant. I can help you develop comprehensive marketing campaigns by providing insights, creative ideas, and trend analysis.

To get started, do you have a marketing campaign guide you can share? It could be a URL, a PDF, or even just the text of the guide.

For example, you could say:

*   "I have a campaign guide at [URL]."
*   "Here's the text of my campaign guide: [paste text here]."
*   "I want to create a campaign for [product/service] targeting [target audience] with a budget of [budget]."

Once I have your guide, I can extract the key information and then use my other tools to help you brainstorm ideas, research trends, and even generate ad content!

reference: Agent marketing_idea_generator_agent setting default values for state variables: campaign_guide, trends, insights.
